headline.main: PRESIDENT REPORTS TO PACIFIC COUNCIL; He Includes Details of Aleutian Battle and Tunisia Campaign in His Account

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 31 -- President Roosevelt reported at length to the Pacific War Council at a meeting in the White House today on his recent conversations with Anthony Eden, British Foreign Secretary, and was represented by members of the council as delighted that there had been so general an agreement in discussions of post-war problems among the United Nations.
